patterns: What are the locations of universities?
responses:

patterns: Can you provide information about waiver or waiver?
responses:
Sure! Here are some of the scholarships available at the university:

1. RESULT-BASED WAIVER (SSC AND HSC/UNDER GRADUATE)
2. WAIVER ON SGPA (ACADEMIC RESULT OF IMMEDIATE LAST SEMESTER)
3. FEMALE QUOTA
4. DIU EMPLOYEE/1ST BLOOD RELATIVES OF DIU EMPLOYEE QUOTA
5. DAFFODIL INTERNATIONAL COLLEGE (DIC)/EMINENCE COLLEGE/HUMAN DEVELOPMENT COLLEGE QUOTA
6. DAFFODIL POLYTECHNIC INSTITUTE (DPI)/BANGLADESH SKILL DEVELOPMENT INSTITUTE (BSDI) QUOTA
7. DIPTI BUSINESS MANAGEMENT (BM) COLLEGE QUOTA
8. DAFFODIL TECHNICAL INSTITUTE (DTI) QUOTA
9. 1ST BLOOD RELATIVES OF ALUMNI QUOTA
10. WAIVER FOR SPOUSE OF DIU ALUMNI QUOTA
11. WAIVER FOR MASTERS PROGRAMS IN DIU
12. PLAYER QUOTA
13. PHYSICALLY CHALLENGED/ SPECIALLY-ABLE QUOTA
14. TRIBAL/ETHNIC GROUP QUOTA
15. SIBLING/SPOUSE QUOTA
16. WAIVER FOR SON/DAUGHTER OF CURRENT STUDENTS QUOTA
17. WAIVER FOR DIPLOMA HOLDERS ADMITTED IN DAY PROGRAM
18. WAIVER FOR STUDENTS ADMITTED IN A GROUP (AT LEAST 10 IN NUMBER)
19. 1ST BATCH OF A PROGRAM QUOTA
20. WAIVER FOR INTERNATIONAL STUDENTS ON DIRECT ADMISSION IN MASTERâ€™S PROGRAM
21. WAIVER BENEFIT FOR DUAL MASTER QUOTA
22. [Download Waiver & Scholarship Policy](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/images/download/waiver-policy2023.pdf)
23. [Waiver and Tuition Fee Calculator](https://daffodilvarsity.edu.bd/tuition-fee-calculator)
